comment.body: Нам необходим источник редиректа. Если вкладка открылась самопроизвольно, то возможно это рекламный вирус, проверьте свой компьютер с помощью [AdwCleaner](https://www.malwarebytes.com/adwcleaner/)  и антивирусом.

issue.title: Fix #141901 www.tf1info.fr

comment.body:
# Remark(s)
 
:thought_balloon: Not sure if these two lines of comment are still required nowadays, by the way:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/b058daad9339b76320404d9af0ea6de20cee8390/FrenchFilter/sections/antiadblock.txt#L573-L574

issue.title: Fix #141901 www.tf1info.fr

comment.body:
# Changelog
 
### :heavy_plus_sign: Added to fix the issue

```adblock
!
! In FrenchFilter > antiadblock.txt file:
!

! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/141901#issuecomment-1434658668
tf1.fr,tf1info.fr#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', 'static.adsafeprotected.com/favicon.ico method:HEAD')
tf1.fr,tf1info.fr#%#//scriptlet('prevent-fetch', '/^https:\/\/ads\.stickyadstv\.com\/$/ method:HEAD')
```

### :heavy_plus_sign: Added as bonus _(detailed comments only present here)_

```adblock
!
! In FrenchFilter > antiadblock.txt file:
!

! Other 'set-constant' stuff will prevent the AAB check request to be done,
! while this one will ensure that even if done, the result doesn't matter.
tf1.fr#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', '__TF1_CONFIG__.featureFlag.contentAccess.isAdblockCheckRequired', 'false')
```

```adblock
!
! In FrenchFilter > general_extensions.txt file:
!

! Additional disabling of video ads (tf1info.fr side)
! in addition to the generic player iframe itself stuff (just as an extra precaution).
tf1info.fr#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', '__NEXT_DATA__.runtimeConfig.playerTF1.ads.enable', 'false')
```

### :magic_wand: Changed as bonus

- **[tf1.fr, tf1info.fr]** Did the JS rules → Scriptlets migration.
  _(Thus, improving the user experience of uBlock Origin users on these popular websites.)_

- **[tf1.fr]** Fixed the rule to hide the bottom banner (about the paid "MYTF1 MAX" offer).
